definition: Jinan University in Guangdong Province, with 4 campuses in Guangzhou, Shenzhen and Zhuhai
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Also available are admissions leaflets at the postgraduate admissions office, Jinan University.
sentences.chinese: 也可到暨南大学研究生招生办公室索取招生简章。

sentences.english: Guangzhou Overseas Chinese Hospital is located on the charming campus of Ji'nan University .
sentences.chinese: 广州华侨医院位于环境优雅的暨南大学校园。

sentences.english: She has been pursuing a bachelor degree in China Law at Jinan University in Guangzhou since 2008.
sentences.chinese: 她于2008年在暨南大学获取中国法学学士学位。

sentences.english: Jinan University now studying at the Department of Television Arts professional director.
sentences.chinese: 现就读于暨南大学艺术学院影视系导演专业。

sentences.english: It is an honor to be with you at Jinan University.
sentences.chinese: 今天来暨南大学和大家见面，我感到很荣幸。

sentences.english: Jinan University has had a long and chequered history.
sentences.chinese: 暨南大学有着悠久而曲折的历史。

sentences.english: Overseas Chinese Hospital is located in the campus of Jinan University with a graceful environment.
sentences.chinese: 广州华侨医院位于环境优雅的暨南大学校园。

sentences.english: I am Ivy, Business Administration Bachelor of Jinan University.
sentences.chinese: 大家也可以叫我笑笑，暨南大学工商管理学士。
